title: Low grade T205s FS/FT: Mathewson and Carrigan UPDATED WITH SCANS
author: collectbaseball

posts.post_title: Low grade T205s FS/FT: Mathewson and Carrigan UPDATED WITH SCANS
posts.post_content:
UPDATED WITH SCANS

Low grade T205s for sale or trade for other T205s or T3s that I need! Been fighting with the scanner all night and can't get it working... if there's any interest I'll scan on a different computer in the morning. 

SOLD Mathewson graded GAI 1. Heavy creasing, slight paper loss on reverse. Piedmont back. $160. SOLD

SOLD Carrigan raw. Off center with some light creasing. Hassan back. Good eye appeal. $24. SOLD

I gave it a day, shoot me the Carrigan if you take paypal.

Rawn
